testcase.name: User successfully access the Add Employee Field when he click on add employee
testcase.system-out: Given User is on HomePage of OrangeHRM application..........................passed When User clicks on PIM Module..............................................passed And clicks on Add Employee..................................................passed Then User successfully access the Add Employee field........................passed

testcase.name: User is successfully add Employee Details with login details
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User enters the Firstname and lastname................................passed And user selected the Login Details Checkbox................................passed And User enters Username and password and confirmpassword..................passed And select the Status.......................................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User navigate to My Info field.........................................passed

testcase.name: User is getting error message when he did not enter Username
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When users enters all the required fields...................................passed But user did not enter Username field.......................................passed Then error message displayed below the username field.......................passed

testcase.name: Failure in adding employee details when the user did not enter password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User enters all required fields........................................passed But user did not enter the password.........................................passed Then Error message displayed on password field..............................passed

testcase.name: User gets error message when he did not enter the firstname
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User did not enter the firstname.......................................passed And user clicks on Save Button..............................................passed Then error message displayed below the firstname field......................passed

testcase.name: User gets error message when he did not enter lastname
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User enter the firstname...............................................passed But user did not the lastname...............................................passed Then error message displayed below the lastname field.......................passed

testcase.name: User gets error when he enter username less than five characters
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User enters all required field.........................................passed But user entered the username less than five characters.....................passed Then error message displayed................................................passed

testcase.name: User gets error message when he entered password less than eight characters
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Add Employee Field.....................................passed When User entered all required fields.......................................passed But user enters the password less than eight characters.....................passed Then error message will be displayed........................................passed

testcase.name: User successfully access the Employee List when he clicks on Employee List
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page of OrangeHRM application.........................passed When user clicks on PIM Module..............................................passed And user clicks on Employee List............................................passed Then User is successfully access the Employee List field....................passed

testcase.name: User is successfully search the employee
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Employee List field........................................passed When User provides the required details.....................................passed And click on Search button..................................................passed Then user information is displayed..........................................passed
